title: Monthly retail sales of beer , wine and liquor stores in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2016 and 2015. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have declined.
Month Aug had the maximum Sales in billion CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Sales in billion CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.
In Month Mar, 2016 had the maximum Sales in billion CAD and it saw the lowest in Month Nov out of all 12 Months.

All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2016 and 2015. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have declined.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2016 and 2015. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have declined.
Month Aug had the maximum Sales in billion CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Sales in billion CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2016 and 2015. In both cases, the Sales in billion CAD have declined.
In Month Aug, 2018 had the highest Sales in billion CAD 202.0 among the 5 groups and in Dec, 2019 had the lowest Sales in billion CAD 0.0.
In Month Mar, 2016 had the highest Sales in billion CAD among all 12 Months and it has the lowest Sales in billion CAD in Month Nov.
The maximum Sales in billion CAD for 2016 that was found in Month Mar was 9.89 times larger than the minimum Sales in billion CAD observed in Month Nov.
Out of all 5 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Sales in billion CAD was found in case of 2017.
2018 had the maximum Sales in billion CAD out of all 5 groups in Month Aug followed by 2018 in Aug, and the minimum Sales in billion CAD is found for 2019 in Dec.
On average, the Month Feb had the highest Sales in billion CAD for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Apr had the lowest average Sales in billion CAD.
